comments.body: I guess defaulting to dev is fine since this is only a test? maybe still worth being explicit about where we need it?

This is a test with quick feedback for the parser.  Handle only 1.dev is fine.
Test of stable version are covered by  `//daml-lf/encoder:validate-dar-x.y` tests.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +23,27 @@
  val defaultParserParameters: ParserParameters[this.type] =
    ParserParameters(pkgId, LanguageVersion.v1_dev)

  "Encode and Decode" should {
